func: var thing = [ { "Number": "Camion1", "Driver": flow.get("camion1.conductor"), "Destination": flow.get("camion1.ruta"), "Time": flow.get("camion1.tiempoRestante"), "Status": flow.get("camion1.status"), "ToCheck": flow.get("camion1.check") }, { "Number": "Camion2", "Driver": "Conductor2", "Destination": "Llenando cuba", "Time": "5M", "Status": 50, "ToCheck": false }, { "Number": "Camion3", "Driver": "Conductor3", "Destination": "LACCIM a CSiset", "Time": "55M", "Status": 85, "ToCheck": true }, { "Number": "Camion4", "Driver": "Conductor4", "Destination": "MAlmar a LACCIM", "Time": "1H 36M", "Status": 36, "ToCheck": false }, { "Number": "Camion5", "Driver": "Conductor5", "Destination": "LACCIM a MGener", "Time": "26M", "Status": 48, "ToCheck": true }, { "Number": "Decanso", "Driver": "Conductor6", "Destination": "", "Time": "", "Status": 85, "ToCheck": true } ] msg.payload = thing; return msg;
